itinerary_summary: A romantic five-day getaway in Mexico City, exploring great culinary spots, vibrant markets, and cultural landmarks.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Arrive in Mexico City and explore local cuisine and attractions.

activities.activity_name: Dinner at Pujol, Mexico City
activities.description: Experience Mexican fine dining created by acclaimed chef Enrique Olvera.

activities.activity_name: Visit Museo Soumaya, Mexico City
activities.description: Explore a vast collection of art, including works by Rodin and Mexican artists.

activities.activity_name: Drinks at Licorería Limantour, Mexico City
activities.description: Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails at one of the best bars in the world.

activities.activity_name: Stroll through Plaza de Garibaldi, Mexico City
activities.description: Experience live mariachi music in the heart of the city.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: A day dedicated to exploring Mexico City’s history and flavors.

activities.activity_name: Breakfast at Lalo!, Mexico City
activities.description: Savor a hearty breakfast at this popular local eatery.

activities.activity_name: Visit the Frida Kahlo Museum, Mexico City
activities.description: Explore the former home of the famous artist, showcasing her life and work.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Mercado Sonora, Mexico City
activities.description: Taste a variety of local snacks and dishes at this vibrant market.

activities.activity_name: Relax at Chapultepec Park, Mexico City
activities.description: Take a leisurely walk and relax in one of the largest city parks in the world.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Discover the vibrant neighborhoods and street foods of Mexico City.

activities.activity_name: Breakfast at Panadería Rosetta, Mexico City
activities.description: Enjoy freshly baked pastries at this renowned bakery.

activities.activity_name: Explore Coyoacán, Mexico City
activities.description: Wander the charming streets and enjoy local street food.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at El Hidalguense, Mexico City
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Mexican barbecue at this famous eatery.

activities.activity_name: Visit the Zócalo, Mexico City
activities.description: Experience the grandeur of the main plaza and its historical significance.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Embark on a culinary journey with a focus on local ingredients and specialties.

activities.activity_name: Breakfast at Casa de Toño, Mexico City
activities.description: Delight in the delicious pozole and other traditional breakfast items.

activities.activity_name: Cooking Class at Casa Jacaranda, Mexico City
activities.description: Learn to prepare authentic Mexican dishes using local ingredients.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at El Moro, Mexico City
activities.description: Indulge in the exquisite churros and hot chocolate at this beloved spot.

activities.activity_name: Explore Roma Norte, Mexico City
activities.description: Stroll through the trendy neighborhood, famous for its food and art.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Last-minute shopping and a relaxing afternoon before departure.

activities.activity_name: Breakfast at Maison Belén, Mexico City
activities.description: Enjoy a cozy breakfast featuring French-Mexican fusion dishes.

activities.activity_name: Shopping at La Ciudadela Market, Mexico City
activities.description: Browse handmade crafts and souvenirs from local artisans.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Taquería El Califa, Mexico City
activities.description: Savor delicious modern tacos at this popular taquería.

activities.activity_name: Relax at Parque México, Mexico City
activities.description: Spend your last moments relaxing in this lovely park before departure.
